title: Cream Puff Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Nozomi-senpai~! Kasumin made my special bread rolls, so please eat them with the rest of μ’s~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Waah, they look tasty~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>(Kufufu. Kasumin gets the feeling that the “get our rival chubby” plan will be a great Success~! These bread rolls are really delicious, but they’re filled to the brim with butter and cream.)<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Speaking of which, Kasumin, did you know? Apparently, today is cream puff day. Elicchi and I found a cake store the other day that has these really delicious cream puffs. I’ll treat you some as a thank you for these bread rolls♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Cream puffs!? Kasumin loves them! ....But cream puffs are pretty high in calories....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>There’s one that has a strawberry on top of it, it looks really cute, you know~. I think it fits perfectly with the cute Kasumin~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>K-, Kasumin wants to try that~! But, my plan.... Uuu~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I really want to eat them with you, Kasumin♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uwaaaaah, Kasumin will go! Kasumin wants to eat cream puffs with you, Nozomi-senpai~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Okay! Delicious things are even more delicious when you eat it together after all♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
